scripts.build: nexe index.js 'TTVDropBot' --ico twitch.ico --rc { CompanyName: "Zarg", PRODUCTVERSION: "1,3,3,0", FILEVERSION: "1,3,3,0"} --build
scripts.buildwithmodules: nexe index.js 'TTVDropBot' -r node_modules/ --ico twitch.ico --rc { CompanyName: "Zarg", PRODUCTVERSION: "1,3,3,1", FILEVERSION: "1,3,3,1"} --build
